messages.content: We have reports of a fight and potential gunshots at 7512 South Howell Avenue.
Did you witness any of this? Can you provide more details?
A bald male with glasses may have shot someone. I didn't see the shooter, but people are saying there's a man with a gun.
Can you confirm the location? 7512 South Howell Avenue?
Yes, at the Sikh temple there. We need an ambulance. I do not see a shooter anywhere.
We are dispatching fire and medical units to your location. Stay safe and do not approach the scene. Do you see any victims?
Yes, there's a victim down in the front yard, there's still noise and shots being heard.
Understood. Can you describe the shooter?
All I know is he might be a bald male with glasses, and he could have gone inside the building.
Got it. Please stay at a safe distance and keep yourself protected. More responders are on the way.
Alright, thank you. I'll wait here.
